name: 'Barry Good' Salmon Patty
author: Got an Man
summary: Every time I do these for my residents they all just love them. Garnish with fresh parsley and lemon slice.
ingredients: 4 pounds pink salmon (such as Chicken of the Sea®), drained, flaked and cartilage removed
1 teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
¼ cup vegetable oil, or as needed
directions: Mix salmon, eggs, bread crumbs, mayonnaise, lemon juice, ranch dressing mix, salt, pepper, garlic powder, dill, and seafood seasoning in a large bowl; divide into 15 portions and shape into patties
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet
Fry a few patties in hot oil, not overcrowding the skillet, until browned, 3 to 4 minutes per side
Repeat until all patties are cooked
Garnish each with a lemon slice and a sprig of parsley
